briefdescription.para: Set either in or out point to the current playhead.

parameterdescription.para: Set to kTrimIn or kTrimOut for setting the in point or out point respectively.

briefdescription.para: Reset either the in or out point.

detaileddescription.para: Sets either the in point to 0 or the out point to RATIONAL_MAX.

parameterdescription.para: Set to kTrimIn or kTrimOut for setting the in point or out point respectively.

briefdescription.para: Slot for when a Block node changes its parameters and the graphics need to update.

detaileddescription.para: This slot does a static_cast on sender() to Block*, meaning all objects triggering this slot must be Blocks or derivatives.

briefdescription.para: Slot to center the horizontal scroll bar on the playhead's current position.

briefdescription.para: Full widget for working with TimelineOutput nodes.

detaileddescription.para: Encapsulates TimelineViews, TimeRulers, and scrollbars for a complete widget to manipulate Timelines
